verses.verse: Wine <S%H3196><s%> is a mocker <S%H3887><s%>, strong drink <S%H7941><s%> a brawler <S%H1993><s%>; And whosoever erreth <S%H7686><s%> thereby is not wise <S%H2449><s%>.

The terror <S%H367><s%> of a king <S%H4428><s%> is as the roaring <S%H5099><s%> of a lion <S%H3715><s%>: He that provoketh him to anger <S%H5674><s%> sinneth <S%H2398><s%> against his own life <S%H5315><s%>.
It is an honor <S%H3519><s%> for a man <S%H376><s%> to keep aloof from strife <S%H7379><s%>; But every fool <S%H191><s%> will be quarrelling <S%H1566><s%>.
The sluggard <S%H6102><s%> will not plow <S%H2790><s%> by reason of the winter <S%H2779><s%>; Therefore he shall beg <S%H7592><s%> in harvest <S%H7105><s%>, and have nothing.

Counsel <S%H6098><s%> in the heart <S%H3820><s%> of man <S%H376><s%> is like deep <S%H6013><s%> water <S%H4325><s%>; But a man <S%H376><s%> of understanding <S%H8394><s%> will draw it out <S%H1802><s%>.
Most <S%H7230><s%> men <S%H120><s%> will proclaim <S%H7121><s%> every one <S%H376><s%> his own kindness <S%H2617><s%>; But a faithful <S%H529><s%> man <S%H376><s%> who can find <S%H4672><s%>?
A righteous <S%H6662><s%> man that walketh <S%H1980><s%> in his integrity <S%H8537><s%>, Blessed <S%H835><s%> are his children <S%H1121><s%> after him <S%H310><s%>.
A king <S%H4428><s%> that sitteth on <S%H3427><s%> the throne <S%H3678><s%> of judgment <S%H1779><s%> Scattereth away <S%H2219><s%> all evil <S%H7451><s%> with his eyes <S%H5869><s%>.
Who can say <S%H559><s%>, I have made my heart <S%H3820><s%> clean <S%H2135><s%>, I am pure <S%H2891><s%> from my sin <S%H2403><s%>?
Diverse weights <S%H68><s%>, and diverse measures <S%H374><s%>, Both <S%H8147><s%> of them alike <S%H1571><s%> are an abomination <S%H8441><s%> to Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.
Even a child <S%H5288><s%> maketh himself known <S%H5234><s%> by his doings <S%H4611><s%>, Whether his work <S%H6467><s%> be pure <S%H2134><s%>, and whether it be right <S%H3477><s%>.
The hearing <S%H8085><s%> ear <S%H241><s%>, and the seeing <S%H7200><s%> eye <S%H5869><s%>, Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hath made <S%H6213><s%> even both of them <S%H8147><s%>.
Love <S%H157><s%> not sleep <S%H8142><s%>, let thou come to poverty <S%H3423><s%>; Open <S%H6491><s%> thine eyes <S%H5869><s%>, and thou shalt be satisfied <S%H7646><s%> with bread <S%H3899><s%>.
It is bad <S%H7451><s%>, it is bad <S%H7451><s%>, saith <S%H559><s%> the buyer <S%H7069><s%>; But when he is gone <S%H235><s%> his way <S%H1984><s%>, then he boasteth.
There is <S%H3426><s%> gold <S%H2091><s%>, and abundance <S%H7230><s%> of rubies <S%H6443><s%>; But the lips <S%H8193><s%> of knowledge <S%H1847><s%> are a precious <S%H3366><s%> jewel <S%H3627><s%>.
Take <S%H3947><s%> his garment <S%H899><s%> that is surety <S%H6148><s%> for a stranger <S%H2114><s%>; And hold him in pledge <S%H2254><s%> that is surety for foreigners <S%H5237><s%>.

Bread <S%H3899><s%> of falsehood <S%H8267><s%> is sweet <S%H6156><s%> to a man <S%H376><s%>; But afterwards <S%H310><s%> his mouth <S%H6310><s%> shall be filled <S%H4390><s%> with gravel <S%H2687><s%>.
Every purpose <S%H4284><s%> is established <S%H3559><s%> by counsel <S%H6098><s%>; And by wise guidance <S%H8458><s%> make <S%H6213><s%> thou war <S%H4421><s%>.

He that goeth about <S%H1980><s%> as a tale-bearer <S%H7400><s%> revealeth <S%H1540><s%> secrets <S%H5475><s%>; Therefore company <S%H6148><s%> not with him that openeth <S%H6601><s%> wide his lips <S%H8193><s%>.
Whoso curseth <S%H7043><s%> his father <S%H1><s%> or his mother <S%H517><s%>, His lamp <S%H5216><s%> shall be put out <S%H1846><s%> in blackness <S%H380><s%> of darkness <S%H2822><s%>.
An inheritance <S%H5159><s%> may be gotten hastily <S%H926><s%> at the beginning <S%H7223><s%>; But the end <S%H319><s%> thereof shall not be blessed <S%H1288><s%>.
Say <S%H559><s%> not thou <S%H7999><s%>, I will recompense evil <S%H7451><s%>: Wait for <S%H6960><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, and he will save thee <S%H3467><s%>.
Diverse weights <S%H68><s%> are an abomination <S%H8441><s%> to Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>; And a false <S%H4820><s%> balance <S%H3976><s%> is not good <S%H2896><s%>.
A man <S%H1397><s%>'s goings <S%H4703><s%> are of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>; How then can man <S%H120><s%> understand <S%H995><s%> his way <S%H1870><s%>?
It is a snare <S%H4170><s%> to a man <S%H120><s%> rashly <S%H3216><s%> to say <S%H6944><s%>, It is holy, And after <S%H310><s%> vows <S%H5088><s%> to make inquiry <S%H1239><s%>.
A wise <S%H2450><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> winnoweth <S%H2219><s%> the wicked <S%H7563><s%>, And bringeth <S%H7725><s%> the threshing <S%H212><s%> -wheel over them.
The spirit <S%H5397><s%> of man <S%H120><s%> is the lamp <S%H5216><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, Searching <S%H2664><s%> all his innermost <S%H2315><s%> parts <S%H2315><s%>.
Kindness <S%H2617><s%> and truth <S%H571><s%> preserve <S%H5341><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%>; And his throne <S%H3678><s%> is upholden <S%H5582><s%> by kindness <S%H2617><s%>.
The glory <S%H8597><s%> of young men <S%H970><s%> is their strength <S%H3581><s%>; And the beauty <S%H1926><s%> of old men <S%H2205><s%> is the hoary head <S%H7872><s%>.
Stripes <S%H2250><s%> that wound <S%H6482><s%> cleanse <S%H8562><s%> away evil <S%H7451><s%>; And strokes <S%H4347><s%> reach the innermost <S%H2315><s%> parts <S%H2315><s%>.
